localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: My Wolfpack is a friendly app that microgroups people according to their interests. If you are not particularly looking for dating but donâ€™t want to meet people in huge groups that forbids you to really get to know them, you are in the right place.
nodes.title: My Wolfpack - Meet new friends according to your interests in micro-groups
nodes.author: Murat Aksu

nodes.excerpt: The Idea Generator by AreYouInterested is a completely free tool to structure your idea generation. It guides you through the Niche-Action-Problem brainstorming system, and allows you to see the ideas that other members of the community came up with, too.
nodes.title: The Idea Generator - A tool to help structure your business idea brainstorming
nodes.author: James Skarzynski

nodes.excerpt: Your Week is a simple weekly planner that I built to help me plan my priorities at the start of the week. It has a clear week-based layout and provides a helpful reminder to plan each week. Try it at https://yourweek.app or get the Android app.
nodes.title: Your Week - Hold yourself accountable to weekly goals and priorities.
nodes.author: Graham Macphee

nodes.excerpt: PetCloud's Pet Taxi Service can drive Pets to and from Vets, Grooming Appointments, to a Pet Sitters house, or to your Wedding Venue. No need to accompany them.
nodes.title: PetCloud's Pet Taxi - Safe drivers to take your pets to appointments
nodes.author: Deb Morrison

nodes.excerpt: Suffering from Zoom fatigue? Sick of meetings, get togethers and conferences? Boss asked a difficult question on video chat? Bufferi.ng gives you a simple way to stutter your webcam and distort the sound. Take back Control of Zoom
nodes.title: Bufferi.ng - Avoid pointless meetings, fake a bad connection on Zoom
nodes.author: Tanya Kurkova

nodes.excerpt: As an early stage founder, it's hard to get in front of the right investors. The Premoney List is a mini-marketplace that presents two founders to a group of 600+ investors each week. ğŸš€ Founders: Meet more investors! ğŸ•µğŸ½â€â™€ï¸ Investors: Discover new companies!
nodes.title: The Premoney List - Connecting founders to investors, every week.

nodes.excerpt: Struum takes the ClassPass model and applies it to streaming services. The team includes former Disney+ and Discovery exes.
nodes.title: Struum - Classpass for streaming

nodes.excerpt: It's about time docs were easy to use, flexible, and actually smart. We designed Input to have the simplicity of writing in a doc, but combined with some of the most powerful features of project management, so remote teams can get more done.
nodes.title: Input - Collaborative notes and docs for remote teams.

nodes.excerpt: Product Names tweets out available domains you can use for inspiration or new projects ğŸš€

nodes.excerpt: PixelMixer is a secure video hosting site and we have recently added support for importing your Zoom video recordings so you can save them for later, search their transcripts, edit with our embedded video editor, or share them with others.
nodes.title: PixelMixer - Save, search, and share your Zoom Recordings
nodes.author: PixelMixer

nodes.excerpt: Cocktail is a general purpose utility for macOS that lets you clean, repair and optimize your Mac. It is a powerful digital toolset that helps hundreds of thousands of Mac users around the world get the most out of their computers every day.
nodes.title: Cocktail - Clean, repair and optimize your Mac ğŸ¸

nodes.excerpt: Effortlessly collect feedback recordings from your users, without having them to install anything. - https://hellozest.io/
nodes.title: Zest - Collect feedback recordings from your users

nodes.excerpt: The first AI powered caption generator. You choose any picture, CapMe uses AI to detect the themes and recommends hundreds of caption suggestions related to your picture. Leverage Capme's image recognition to find the right words for your pictures instantly.
nodes.title: Capme+ - The first AI powered caption generator.
nodes.author: Yassine Attia

nodes.excerpt: Getting a journalist to talk about your startup is not easy, but our platform makes it simple. Pressful connects startups with professional journalists, who will conduct a 5 minute video interview & blast it off ğŸš€ to major news outlets.
nodes.title: Pressful - Get instant access to journalists who will interview you
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: RHTRH is an open source Chrome extension that raises your (virtual) hand on Google Meet when you raise your (physical) hand. RHTRH works with on any Chromium browsers for all organisations using Google Workspace.
nodes.title: Raise Hand To Raise Hand - Raise your hand in real life to raise your hand on Meet
nodes.author: Lorenzo Signoretti

nodes.excerpt: Become a certified email marketing expert with this flexible online learning platform. Join the MailerLite Academy, a series of free video courses that let you learn at your own pace. Designed for both beginners and advanced email marketers. See you in class!
nodes.title: Email Marketing Academy from MailerLite - Learning platform for email marketing expert certification

nodes.excerpt: Unstack's content platform now allows you to set up one-time and subscription payments as well as launch membership sites with granular page-level access controls for users. Turn your digital content into a money-making machine using Unstack and Stripe.
nodes.title: Unstack Payments - eCommerce landing pages and membership sites
nodes.author: Grant Deken

nodes.excerpt: Statusly is a Slack bot that helps you automate your Slack status and DND/away settings with Powerful Routines. Sync your Google Calendar and Zoom Meetings with your custom routines. For more information visit https://statusly.app/.
nodes.title: Statusly - Automate Slack status, DND based on your daily routines ğŸ¤–

nodes.excerpt: Most scheduling tools put the burden on the recipient. SavvyCal makes it easy for both parties to find the best time to meetâ€”in an instant.
nodes.title: SavvyCal - Sending your scheduling link shouldn't feel weird.

nodes.excerpt: Heartface is a frictionless checkout that enables e-commerce for any product link; letting people shop multiple products from multiple stores without being redirected out of a referring website/app.
nodes.title: Heartface - One-click checkout for any product, enabled everywhere ğŸ˜
